name: Hold Right
description:
Hold Right is a fast-paced 2D platformer game. This is my second game I've finished, so be prepared for some JANK. Keyboard and controller input is supported, but I highly recommend using a controller. Also there's a huge difficulty spike between the fourth and last level because I was gonna add more levels, but like nah.

There are pretty much no textures or sprites used in this game, almost everything is used with default Unity assets. But as a great man once said, "who even needs sprites when you have post processing" -George Washingmachine

This game had absolutely no playtesting until now, and I already have a long list of issues that need to be solved, but that will come in a 1.1 update.
